Description: Glazed composition shabti of Wʿrtw Py3y with painted detail: a cream and brown striated lappet-wig, a red modelled face with black traced eyes and a cream body with a brown collar and crossed red hands in relief holding two brown hoes and the string of the brown seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with two(surviving) rows of brown painted Hieroglyphs; the lower leg section has broken away.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
